Class NotificationScreen

java.lang.Object

com.group6.hms.framework.screens.pagination.PaginationTableScreen<Notification>

com.group6.hms.app.notifications.NotificationScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScreenLifeCycle
public class NotificationScreen extends SinglePaginationTableScreen<Notification>
The NotificationScreen class displays notifications for the currently logged-in user in a paginated table format. It allows users to view individual notifications and provides an option to dismiss all notifications at once.

  • Constructor Details

    • NotificationScreen

      public NotificationScreen()
      Constructs a new NotificationScreen and initializes the notification display. It sets up pagination with a maximum of MAX_NOTIFICATIONS_DISPLAY_PER_PAGE items per page and adds an option to dismiss all notifications.

  • Method Details

    • handleOption

      protected void handleOption(int optionId)
      Handles user-selected options. If the dismiss all notifications option is selected, it removes all notifications for the current user and refreshes the display.
      Overrides:
      handleOption in class PaginationTableScreen<Notification>
      Parameters:
      optionId - the ID of the selected option

    • displaySingleItem

      public void displaySingleItem(Notification item)
      Displays a single notification item in a vertical table format.
      Specified by:
      displaySingleItem in class SinglePaginationTableScreen<Notification>
      Parameters:
      item - the Notification to be displayed
